disease_detection.title: Plant Disease Detection

instructions.title: How to use:
instructions.step1: 1. Take a clear photo of the plant leaf or affected area
instructions.step2: 2. Make sure the leaf is well-lit and in focus
instructions.step3: 3. Tap the analyze button to detect diseases

soil_analysis.title: Soil Analysis

instructions.title: How to use:
instructions.step1: 1. Take a clear photo of the soil sample
instructions.step2: 2. Make sure the soil is visible and well-lit
instructions.step3: 3. Tap the analyze button to assess soil properties
